string.value: I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #bAllowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!
Hey! Hope your day's going well. We sell #bNexon Game Cards#k here. Are you here to get yours?\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Oh yea!#l#k

Well, I have something here called a #bNexon Game Card#k. It comes in 2 kinds: #b100 points#k and #b250 points#k. These are available wherever you see my store. You will need your #b#t4031529##k from your Mom and Dad to get one, though. Have you helped them with Thanksgiving Dinner?

#b#L0#Yep! Mom's making enough food to keep our Aunt Petunia fed for a few hours!#l#k
#b#L1#No. I'm not going to either--I should just get #t4031529#, why should I have to work?#l#k
Good job! Well, are you ready to get your #bNexon Game Card#k?
Well, working hard is what gets you ahead in life. Maybe you should talk to your parents a bit more so you can learn that...
Ok. Let me get it for you. Be right back! <runs to the counter and grabs one of the cards from the stack behind the counter>
Come back anytime you change your mind. Have a nice day!
Ah, back already I see, ready to get your #bNexon Prepaid#k?
Excellent, well, here you go! Remember to keep it, after the Event ends, it will become #rMaple Points#k you can use in the Cash Shop!
Looks like you have some dirt, but not your #bAllowance#k. When you get your #bAllowance#k from Mom and Dad, be sure to return!
